About Wild Water World

Welcome to Wild Water World!
This website was designed and developed to display my ability to deploy and maintain the front-end of a website. It was developed on a Mac using VS Code as the text editor. The default bash terminal was used to push the code to GitHub for version control (view here). The markup was written in semantic HTML 5 and was styled using CSS 3 with Sass (SCSS) as the pre-processor. Custom reusable CSS components were written for this project. CSS Grid & Flexbox were utilized throughout the site for various element layouts.

This website is responsive, meaning it utilizes Media Queries to adapt to all differant screen sizes, and is fully functional on each size.
